channel.title: Need Help starting up again: Basics
channel.description:
Yeah, I used to know how to do this, but that was WELL over a year ago, and a LOT has changed here since then. And so, I would like to find tutorials about EVERYTHING I need to learn to be a decent coder and host. I know there are hosting tutorials and stuff, and I did look in the...(insert name of the section used for tutorials)... but didn't find any on the basics themselves.
Links to guides on these are what im looking for. I don't mind a long read :D
Yes, I admit that I currently know about 2 things about coding in Java.
1. Coding is complicated 2. Its a lot of weird text

item.title: Need Help starting up again: Basics
item.dc:creator: @xoskullxo13 xoskullxo13
item.description:
@xoskullxo13 wrote:

Lol. I taught myself coding (Although I’m not that good) but I started off by just copying commands, and just editing them. For example, I started off with a simple command like this:

 if (command.startsWith("notedbarrows") && playerRights >= 1)
			{
				addItem(4717, 1000);
                                addItem(4719, 1000);
        			addItem(4721, 1000);
        			addItem(4723, 1000);
        			addItem(4709, 1000);
        			addItem(4711, 1000);
        			addItem(4713, 1000);
        			addItem(4715, 1000);
        			addItem(4754, 1000);
        			addItem(4756, 1000);
        			addItem(4758, 1000);
        			addItem(4760, 1000);
        			addItem(4746, 1000);
        			addItem(4748, 1000);
        			addItem(4750, 1000);
        			addItem(4752, 1000);
        			addItem(4733, 1000);
        			addItem(4735, 1000);
        			addItem(4737, 1000);
        			addItem(4739, 1000);
        			addItem(4727, 1000);
        			addItem(4729, 1000);
        			addItem(4731, 1000);
        			addItem(4725, 1000);
			}

Then I changed the numbers, for example “addItem(4752, 1000);” to the ID I wanted to put, like in this case, the code will be 4752, and that would be a barrows item. Then if I wanted to change it to cash, I would change 4725 to 995, and then change 1000 to the amount of cash I want to have when I type that command.

And java isn’t alot of weird words, it’s really easy.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help starting up again: Basics
